name: Distribution of occupation and median standardized hourly wage for current or most recent job of students in grade 9 in fall 2009 who had not enrolled in postsecondary education and had worked for pay since leaving high school, by selected demographic characteristics: 2016
description: Distribution of occupation and median standardized hourly wage for current or most recent job of students in grade 9 in fall 2009 who had not enrolled in postsecondary education and had worked for pay since leaving high school, by selected demographic characteristics: 2016

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_median_standardized_hourly_wage_a_most_recent_stw_job
variableMeasured.description: Median Standardized Hourly Wage A Most Recent Stw Job

variableMeasured.name: field_median_standardized_hourly_wage_a_most_recent_non_stw_job
variableMeasured.description: Median Standardized Hourly Wage A Most Recent Non Stw Job

notes: About 28% of students in grade 9 in fall 2009 had not enrolled in postsecondary education as of February 2016.
sources: Radford AW, Fritch LB, Leu K, and Duprey M, High School Longitudinal Study of 2009 (HSLS:09) Second Follow-Up: A First Look at Fall 2009 Ninth-Graders in 2016, NCES 2018-139 (2018); National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, National Science Foundation, special tabulations (2018) of HSLS:09, National Center for Education Statistics, Department of Education.Science and Engineering Indicators
